title: BN struggles to get max peers for some users

labels.name: scope-networking
labels.description: All issues related to networking, gossip, and libp2p.

labels.name: meta-investigate
labels.description: Issues found that require further investigation and may not have a specific resolution/fix

body:
**Problem**

It has been reported by some users that their Lodestar BN takes up to 40 minutes to get to max peers (50).

**Logs**

- [beacon-log-peering-issues.txt](https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/files/11262965/beacon-log-peering-issues.txt)
- [beacon-2023-04-03-full-peering-issues.log](https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/past4nw8ue0eti4dlp01n/beacon-2023-04-03-full-peering-issues.log?rlkey=cbs0q62b7i4bkqg5b9bo0nqyh&dl=0)

**Discord**

- https://discord.com/channels/593655374469660673/743858262864167062/1089588530856067102
- https://discord.com/channels/593655374469660673/743858262864167062/1095501765358661722
- https://discord.com/channels/593655374469660673/605818244036821012/1092710957324701706
- https://discord.com/channels/593655374469660673/593655641445367808/1106598080498892830

It looks like the problem here is that the node is not able to range sync.

Issue does not seem to be isolated to a specific client

Summary of the beacon_blocks_by_range error logs per client:

- Prysm: 487 occurrences
- Teku: 40 occurrences
- Lodestar: 10 occurrences
- Nimbus: 102 occurrences
- Lighthouse: 1674 occurrences

Disconnect reasons:

- "Client has too many peers": 1936 occurrences
- "Internal fault": 150 occurrences
- "Peer banned this node": 32 occurrences
- "INCOMPATIBLE_FORKS ours": 26 occurrences
- "Peer score too low": 20 occurrences
- "Client shutdown": 15 occurrences
- "Irrelevant network": 10 occurrences


Disconnect reason is predominantly "Client has too many peers"


Why are there so many timeouts
- Network might be slow, low bandwidth?
- Lodestar sends too many concurrent batch download requests causing network congestion?
- Lodestar suffers from high event loop lag / high I/O lag during range sync?
